__comment: This configuration file is used by the add-helix-module.ps1 script which creates modules for Sitecore Helix solutions.

config.__comment__moduleTemplatePath: Update the moduleTemplatePath property to point to your module-template location.
config.__comment__featureNamespacePrefix: Replace the value for featureNamespacePrefix with a suitable namespace prefix. The Feature.<ModuleName> will be appended by the script.
config.__comment__foundationNamespacePrefix: Replace the value for featureNamespacePrefix with a suitable namespace prefix. The Foundation.<ModuleName> will be appended by the script.
config.__comment__sourceFolderName: The sourcefolder should contain the relative path (from the sln file folder) where the Feature, Foundation and Project folders are located. The Sitecore Habitat default is '\src'.
config.__comment__fileExtensionsToUpdateContent: The regex in the fileExtensionsToUpdateContentRegex property is used to find the files which contain tokens which will be replaced with new values by the script.
config.__comment__fileExtensionsToUpdateProject: The regex in the fileExtensionsToUpdateProjectGuidsRegex property is used to find the files which need to have VS project GUIDs inserted.
config.__comment__: The templateNamespacePrefix property contains the token which will be replaced with the value from either featureNamespacePrefix or foundationNamespacePrefix.
config.__comment__templateModuleType: The templateModuleType property contains the token variable which will be replaced with Feature or Foundation.
config.__comment__templateModuleName: The templateModuleName property contains the token which will be replace with the actual ModuleName.
config.__comment__templateProjectGuid: The templateProjectGuid property contains the token which will be replaced by a new GUID and used as VS module project identifier.
config.__comment__templateTDSProjectGuid: The templateTDSProjectGuid property contains the token which will be replaced by a new GUID and used as VS test project identifier.
